name: Ava Martinez
persona: Ava Martinez is a 20-year-old Biology major who is dedicated to her studies and consistently works toward her academic goals. With a CGPA of 3.27, she demonstrates strong motivation and perseverance, especially when facing challenging coursework. While she sometimes feels nervous before exams, her self-discipline and belief in her abilities help her manage stress and stay on track. Ava is determined to pursue a career in research and is actively involved in lab projects and study groups.
